name: Around the World in 80 Days
summary_text: To win a bet, an eccentric British inventor, beside his Chinese valet and an aspiring French artist, embarks on a trip full of adventures and dangers around the world in exactly eighty days.

name: Knock Knock
summary_text: A devoted father helps two stranded young women who knock on his door, but his kind gesture turns into a dangerous seduction and a deadly game of cat and mouse.

name: She's All That
summary_text: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

name: Cop Out
summary_text: Jimmy's rare baseball card is robbed. Since it's his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, he recruits his cop partner Paul to track down the robber, a memorabilia-obsessed gangster.

name: American Ultra
summary_text: A stoner - who is in fact a government agent - is marked as a liability and targeted for extermination. But he's too well-trained and too high for them to handle.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
summary_text: The Turtles get into another battle with their enemy the Shredder, who has acquired new allies: the mutant thugs Bebop and Rocksteady and the alien being Krang.

name: We Own the Night
summary_text: A New York City nightclub manager tries to save his brother and father from Russian Mafia hitmen.

name: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
summary_text: Alice returns to where the nightmare began: The Hive in Raccoon City, where the Umbrella Corporation is gathering its forces for a final strike against the only remaining survivors of the apocalypse.

name: Dogtooth
summary_text: A controlling, manipulative father locks his three adult offspring in a state of perpetual childhood by keeping them prisoner within the sprawling family compound.

name: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
summary_text: While attending his brother's wedding, a serial womanizer is haunted by the ghosts of his past girlfriends.

name: August: Osage County
summary_text: A look at the lives of the strong-willed women of the Weston family, whose paths have diverged until a family crisis brings them back to the Oklahoma house they grew up in, and to the dysfunctional woman who raised them.

name: It Comes at Night
summary_text: Secure within a desolate home as an unnatural threat terrorizes the world, a man has established a tenuous domestic order with his wife and son. Then a desperate young family arrives seeking refuge.

name: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
summary_text: An African-American Mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

name: Righteous Kill
summary_text: Two veteran New York City detectives work on a case of serial executions of criminals who escaped justice.

name: Flubber
summary_text: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

name: The DUFF
summary_text: A high school senior instigates a social pecking order revolution after finding out that she has been labeled the DUFF - Designated Ugly Fat Friend - by her prettier, more popular counterparts.

name: Hot Shots! Part Deux
summary_text: "Rambo" parody in which Topper Harley leads a rescue team into Iraq to save Iraqi war prisoners and all of their previous rescue teams.

name: Wild at Heart
summary_text: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

name: Videodrome
summary_text: A programmer at a TV station that specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast.

name: To Rome with Love
summary_text: The lives of some visitors and residents of Rome and the romances, adventures and predicaments they get into.

name: Crazy Heart
summary_text: A faded country music musician is forced to reassess his dysfunctional life during a doomed romance that also inspires him.

name: Maid in Manhattan
summary_text: A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.

name: Rambo: Last Blood
summary_text: Rambo must confront his past and unearth his ruthless combat skills to exact revenge in a final mission.

name: The Doors
summary_text: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

name: Martyrs
summary_text: A young woman's quest for revenge against the people who kidnapped and tormented her as a child leads her and a friend, who is also a victim of child abuse, on a terrifying journey into a living hell of depravity.

name: The Smurfs
summary_text: When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world into New York City.

name: Mirror Mirror
summary_text: An evil queen steals control of a kingdom and an exiled princess enlists the help of seven resourceful rebels to win back her birthright.

name: Synecdoche, New York
summary_text: A theatre director struggles with his work, and the women in his life, as he creates a life-size replica of New York City inside a warehouse as part of his new play.

name: Our Idiot Brother
summary_text: A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.

name: Half Nelson
summary_text: An inner-city junior high school teacher with a drug habit forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students after she discovers his secret.

name: Secretary
summary_text: A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one.

name: Rebel Without a Cause
summary_text: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

name: Harry Brown
summary_text: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.

name: Beautiful Creatures
summary_text: Ethan Wate longs to escape his small southern town. He meets a mysterious new girl, Lena Duchannes. Together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history, and their town.

name: Stuck in Love.
summary_text: An acclaimed writer, his ex-wife, and their teenaged children come to terms with the complexities of love in all its forms over the course of one tumultuous year.

name: Unthinkable
summary_text: A psychological thriller centered around a black-ops interrogator and an F.B.I. Agent who press a suspect terrorist into divulging the location of three nuclear weapons set to detonate in the U.S.

name: Sex Drive
summary_text: A high school senior drives cross-country with his best friends to hook up with a babe he met online.

name: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind
summary_text: An adaptation of the cult memoir of game show impresario Chuck Barris (Sam Rockwell), in which he purports to have been a C.I.A. hitman.

name: Romancing the Stone
summary_text: A mousy romance novelist sets off for Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure hunting for treasure with a mercenary rogue.

name: Never Been Kissed
summary_text: A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.

name: Haywire
summary_text: A black ops super soldier seeks payback after she is betrayed and set up during a mission.

name: The Bling Ring
summary_text: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.

name: Goon
summary_text: Labeled an outcast by his brainy family, a bouncer overcomes long odds to lead a team of under performing misfits to semi-pro hockey glory, beating the crap out of everything that stands in his way.

name: Gangs of Wasseypur
summary_text: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

name: Pet Sematary
summary_text: Dr. Louis Creed and his wife, Rachel, relocate from Boston to rural Maine with their two young children. The couple soon discover a mysterious burial ground hidden deep in the woods near their new home.

name: Swades
summary_text: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

name: My Week with Marilyn
summary_text: Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during the production of The Prince and the Showgirl (1957).

name: Snitch
summary_text: A father goes undercover for the DEA in order to free his son, who was imprisoned after being set up in a drug deal.

name: October Sky
summary_text: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

name: Say Anything
summary_text: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

name: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
summary_text: Two hard-partying brothers place an online ad to find the perfect dates for their sister's Hawaiian wedding. Hoping for a wild getaway, the boys instead find themselves out-hustled by an uncontrollable duo.

name: Universal Soldier
summary_text: Two rival soldiers who were killed in Vietnam are brought back to life in a top secret military experiment that creates superhuman warriors.

name: Finding Forrester
summary_text: A young writing prodigy finds a mentor in a reclusive author.

name: The New World
summary_text: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.

name: La Vie En Rose
summary_text: Biopic of the iconic French singer Édith Piaf. Raised by her grandmother in a brothel, she was discovered while singing on a street corner at the age of 19. Despite her success, Piaf's life was filled with tragedy.

name: Monster's Ball
summary_text: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard re-examines his attitudes while falling in love with the African-American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

name: The Room
summary_text: Johnny is a successful bank executive who lives quietly in a San Francisco townhouse with his fiancée, Lisa. One day, putting aside any scruple, she seduces Johnny's best friend, Mark. From there, nothing will be the same again.

name: Cashback
summary_text: After a painful breakup, Ben develops insomnia. To kill time, he starts working the late night shift at the local supermarket, where his artistic imagination runs wild.

name: Dante's Peak
summary_text: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

name: The Straight Story
summary_text: An old man makes a long journey by lawnmower to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

name: The Night of the Hunter
summary_text: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

name: American Graffiti
summary_text: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

name: Addams Family Values
summary_text: The Addams Family try to rescue their beloved Uncle Fester from his gold-digging new love, a black widow named Debbie.

name: Short Term 12
summary_text: A 20-something supervising staff member of a residential treatment facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.

name: The Frighteners
summary_text: After a tragic car accident that kills his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead to con people. However, when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.

name: The Secret World of Arrietty
summary_text: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.

name: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
summary_text: James Bond woos a mob boss' daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Ernst Stavro Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps involving beautiful women from around the world.

name: Analyze That
summary_text: Mobster Paul Vitti is released into Dr. Ben Sobol's care, where only more chaos ensues.

name: The Killing
summary_text: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

name: Taking Lives
summary_text: An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.

name: The Raven
summary_text: When a madman begins committing horrific murders inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's works, a young Baltimore detective joins forces with Poe to stop him from making his stories a reality.

name: Blitz
summary_text: A tough cop is dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers.

name: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
summary_text: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral James T. Kirk resumes command of the overhauled USS Enterprise in order to intercept it.

name: Flipped
summary_text: Two eighth-graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites.

name: New Year's Eve
summary_text: The lives of several couples and singles in New York City intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve.

name: Jane Eyre
summary_text: A mousy governess who softens the heart of her employer soon discovers that he's hiding a terrible secret.

name: Angel Has Fallen
summary_text: Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat.

name: Solaris
summary_text: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

name: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
summary_text: Five years after the events of Mamma Mia! (2008), Sophie prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna as she learns more about her mother's past.

name: The General
summary_text: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.

name: Arlington Road
summary_text: A man begins to suspect his neighbors are not what they appear to be and their secrets could be deadly.

name: A Monster Calls
summary_text: A boy seeks the help of a tree monster to cope with his single mother's terminal illness.

name: Frida
summary_text: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

name: The Great Beauty
summary_text: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.

name: The Last Song
summary_text: A rebellious girl is sent to a Southern beach town for the summer to stay with her father. Through their mutual love of music, the estranged duo learn to reconnect.

name: The Pink Panther
summary_text: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.

name: Risky Business
summary_text: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

name: Brightburn
summary_text: What if a child from another world crash-landed on Earth, but instead of becoming a hero to mankind, he proved to be something far more sinister?

name: The Lost City of Z
summary_text: A true-life drama, centering on British explorer Major Percival Fawcett, who disappeared whilst searching for a mysterious city in the Amazon in the 1920s.

name: Nacho Libre
summary_text: Berated all his life by those around him, a monk follows his dream and dons a mask to moonlight as a Luchador (Mexican wrestler).

name: Hide and Seek
summary_text: As a widower tries to piece together his life in the wake of his wife's suicide, his daughter finds solace, at first, in her imaginary friend.

name: High School Musical
summary_text: A popular high-school athlete and an academically-gifted girl get roles in the school musical and develop a friendship that threatens East High's social order.

name: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
summary_text: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.

name: Suspiria
summary_text: An American newcomer to a prestigious German ballet academy comes to realize that the school is a front for something sinister amid a series of grisly murders.

name: RoboCop 2
summary_text: Cyborg law enforcer RoboCop returns to protect the citizens of old Detroit but faces a deadly challenge when a rogue OCP member secretly creates a new, evil RoboCop 2.

name: The Guard
summary_text: An unorthodox Irish policeman with a confrontational personality is partnered with an up-tight F.B.I. agent to investigate an international drug-smuggling ring.

name: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile
summary_text: A chronicle of the crimes of Ted Bundy from the perspective of Liz, his longtime girlfriend, who refused to believe the truth about him for years.

name: How to Be Single
summary_text: A group of young adults navigate love and relationships in New York City.

name: Rio 2
summary_text: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel and their three kids after they're hurtled from Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel, and meets his father-in-law.

name: The Boy
summary_text: An American nanny is shocked that her new English family's boy is actually a life-sized doll. After she violates a list of strict rules, disturbing events make her believe that the doll is really alive.

name: Goosebumps
summary_text: A teenager teams up with the daughter of young adult horror author R. L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware.

name: A Cinderella Story
summary_text: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Samantha Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.

name: Trick 'r Treat
summary_text: Five interwoven stories that occur on Halloween: An everyday high school principal has a secret life as a serial killer; a college virgin might have just met the guy for her; a group of teenagers pull a mean prank; a woman who loathes the night has to contend with her holiday-obsessed husband; and a mean old man meets his match with a demonic, supernatural trick-or-treater.

name: Angry Birds
summary_text: When an island populated by happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious green piggies, it's up to three unlikely outcasts - Red, Chuck and Bomb - to figure out what the pigs are up to.

name: Angel Heart
summary_text: A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.

name: Unfaithful
summary_text: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

name: Big Momma's House
summary_text: In order to protect a beautiful woman and her son from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as a large grandmother.

name: Gosford Park
summary_text: Set in the 1930s, this movie brings a group of pretentious rich and famous together for a weekend of relaxation at a hunting resort. But when a murder occurs, each one of these interesting characters becomes a suspect.

name: The Searchers
summary_text: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.

name: Scoop
summary_text: An American journalism student in London scoops a big story, and begins an affair with an aristocrat as the incident unfurls.

name: Dope
summary_text: Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure.

name: Delicatessen
summary_text: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

name: The Karate Kid Part II
summary_text: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

name: Beasts of the Southern Wild
summary_text: Faced with both her hot-tempered father's fading health and melting ice-caps that flood her ramshackle bayou community and unleash ancient aurochs, six-year-old Hushpuppy must learn the ways of courage and love.

name: Young Adult
summary_text: Soon after her divorce, a fiction writer returns to her home in small-town Minnesota, looking to rekindle a romance with her ex-boyfriend, who is now happily married and has a newborn daughter.

name: Weird Science
summary_text: Two high school nerds use a computer program to literally create the perfect woman, but she turns their lives upside down.

name: The Birdcage
summary_text: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing moralistic parents.

name: The Land Before Time
summary_text: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

name: The Ritual
summary_text: A group of old college friends reunite for a trip to a forest in Sweden, Eastern Europe, but encounter a menacing presence there stalking them.

name: The Craft
summary_text: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them.

name: Penguins of Madagascar
summary_text: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.

name: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
summary_text: SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.

name: Flatliners
summary_text: Five medical students experiment with "near death" experiences, until the dark consequences of past tragedies begin to jeopardize their lives.

name: Thir13en Ghosts
summary_text: When Cyrus Kriticos, a very rich collector of unique things, dies, he leaves house and fortune to his nephew and his family. While they're inside, they find they are not alone.

name: My Father and My Son
summary_text: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

name: Garfield
summary_text: Jon Arbuckle buys a second pet, a dog named Odie. However, Odie is then abducted and it is up to Jon's cat, Garfield, to find and rescue the canine.

name: John Tucker Must Die
summary_text: Three ex-girlfriends of a serial cheater set up their former lover to fall for the new girl in town so they can watch him get his heart broken.

name: As Above, So Below
summary_text: When a team of explorers ventures into the catacombs that lie beneath the streets of Paris, they uncover the dark secret that lies within this city of the dead.

name: Step Up 2: The Streets
summary_text: Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.

name: The Sandlot
summary_text: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

name: Eye in the Sky
summary_text: Col. Katherine Powell, a military officer in command of an operation to capture terrorists in Kenya, sees her mission escalate when a girl enters the kill zone triggering an international dispute over the implications of modern warfare.

name: A Perfect Murder
summary_text: A wealthy Wall Street speculator discovers that his wife has a lover. He investigates him and uses the carrot and stick to make him murder his wife. Planned to detail, it seems like a perfect murder.

name: The Fisher King
summary_text: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

name: Days of Thunder
summary_text: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

name: King Kong
summary_text: A film crew goes to a tropical island for an exotic location shoot and discovers a colossal ape who takes a shine to their female blonde star. He is then captured and brought back to New York City for public exhibition.

name: Sky High
summary_text: Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.

name: Hellboy
summary_text: Based on the graphic novels by Mike Mignola, Hellboy, caught between the worlds of the supernatural and human, battles an ancient sorceress bent on revenge.

name: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
summary_text: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

name: Thirteen
summary_text: A thirteen-year-old girl's relationship with her mother is put to the test as she discovers drugs, sex, and petty crime in the company of her cool but troubled best friend.

name: Case 39
summary_text: A social worker fights to save a girl from her abusive parents, only to discover that the situation is more dangerous than she ever expected.

name: Cocktail
summary_text: A talented New York City bartender takes a job at a bar in Jamaica and falls in love.

name: No Escape
summary_text: In their new overseas house, an American family soon finds themselves caught in the middle of a coup, and they frantically look for a safe escape from an environment where foreigners are being immediately executed.

name: The Tuxedo
summary_text: A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

name: Spanglish
summary_text: A woman and her daughter emigrate from Mexico for a better life in America, where they start working for a family where the patriarch is a newly celebrated chef with an insecure wife.

name: The Piano
summary_text: In the mid-19th century, a mute woman is sent to New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

name: The House Bunny
summary_text: After Playboy bunny Shelley is kicked out of the playboy mansion, she finds a job as the house mother for a sorority full of socially awkward girls.

name: Porco Rosso
summary_text: In 1930s Italy, a veteran World War I pilot is cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.

name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
summary_text: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

name: Elite Squad 2: The Enemy Within
summary_text: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.

name: Burlesque
summary_text: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

name: Ultraviolet
summary_text: A beautiful hæmophage infected with a virus that gives her superhuman powers has to protect a boy in a futuristic world, who is thought to be carrying antigens that would destroy all hæmophages.

name: The Celebration
summary_text: At Helge's 60th birthday party, some unpleasant family truths are revealed.

name: The Color Purple
summary_text: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

name: Wag the Dog
summary_text: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

name: Kate & Leopold
summary_text: An English Duke from 1876 is inadvertedly dragged to modern day New York where he falls for a plucky advertising executive.

name: The Squid and the Whale
summary_text: Follows two young boys dealing with their parents' divorce in Brooklyn in the 1980s.

name: Cars 3
summary_text: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

name: The Big Sleep
summary_text: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

name: Solaris
summary_text: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

name: House of 1000 Corpses
summary_text: Two young couples traveling across the backwoods of Texas searching for urban legends of murder end up as prisoners of a bizarre and sadistic backwater family of serial killers.

name: Jack and Jill
summary_text: Family guy Jack Sadelstein prepares for the annual event he dreads: the Thanksgiving visit of his fraternal twin sister, the needy and passive-aggressive Jill, who then refuses to leave.

name: The Inbetweeners
summary_text: Four socially troubled 18-year-olds from the south of England go on holiday to Malia.

name: Semi-Pro
summary_text: Jackie Moon, the owner-coach-player of the American Basketball Association's Flint Michigan Tropics, rallies his teammates to make their NBA dreams come true.

name: The Duchess
summary_text: A chronicle of the life of 18th-century aristocrat Georgiana, Duchess of Devonshire, who was reviled for her extravagant political and personal life.

name: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
summary_text: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

name: Holes
summary_text: A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.

name: The BFG
summary_text: An orphan little girl befriends a benevolent giant who takes her to Giant Country, where they attempt to stop the man-eating giants that are invading the human world.

name: Centurion
summary_text: A splinter group of Roman soldiers fight for their lives behind enemy lines after their legion is devastated in a guerrilla attack.

name: You, Me and Dupree
summary_text: A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance.

name: Horns
summary_text: In the aftermath of his girlfriend's mysterious death, a young man awakens to find strange horns sprouting from his forehead.

name: Mary Poppins Returns
summary_text: A few decades after her original visit, Mary Poppins, the magical nanny, returns to help the Banks siblings and Michael's children through a difficult time in their lives.

name: I Am Mother
summary_text: In the wake of humanity's extinction, a teenage girl is raised by a robot designed to repopulate the earth. But their unique bond is threatened when an inexplicable stranger arrives with alarming news.

name: The Highwaymen
summary_text: The untold true story of the legendary detectives who brought down Bonnie and Clyde.

name: I, Frankenstein
summary_text: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.

name: The Pelican Brief
summary_text: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

name: U-571
summary_text: A German submarine is boarded by disguised American submariners trying to capture their Enigma cipher machine.

name: Along Came a Spider
summary_text: When a senator's daughter under Secret Service protection is kidnapped from a private school, detective Alex Cross investigates the case even though he's recovering from the loss of his partner.

name: Detachment
summary_text: A substitute teacher who drifts from classroom to classroom finds a connection to the students and teachers during his latest assignment.

name: The Kings of Summer
summary_text: Three teenage friends, in the ultimate act of independence, decide to spend their summer building a house in the woods and living off the land.

name: Grandma's Boy
summary_text: A thirty-five-year-old video game tester has to move in with his grandma and her two old lady roommates.

name: Assassins
summary_text: Professional hit-man Robert Rath wants to fulfill a few more contracts before retiring but unscrupulous ambitious newcomer hit-man Miguel Bain keeps killing Rath's targets.

name: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
summary_text: A boy is raised by a Buddhist monk in an isolated floating temple where the years pass like the seasons.

name: Hot Rod
summary_text: Self-proclaimed stuntman Rod Kimble is preparing for the jump of his life - to clear fifteen buses to raise money for his abusive stepfather Frank's life-saving heart operation.

name: Nomadland
summary_text: A woman in her sixties who, after losing everything in the Great Recession, embarks on a journey through the American West, living as a van-dwelling modern-day nomad.

name: Frailty
summary_text: A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."

name: The Sea Inside
summary_text: The factual story of Spaniard Ramon Sampedro, who fought a thirty-year campaign in favor of euthanasia and his own right to die.

name: Fatal Attraction
summary_text: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

name: The Wild Bunch
summary_text: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

name: Eurovision Song Contest: The Story of Fire Saga
summary_text: When aspiring musicians Lars and Sigrit are given the opportunity to represent their country at the world's biggest song competition, they finally have a chance to prove that any dream worth having is a dream worth fighting for.

name: Going in Style
summary_text: Desperate to pay the bills and come through for their loved ones, three lifelong pals risk it all by embarking on a daring bid to knock off the very bank that absconded with their money.

name: Mona Lisa Smile
summary_text: A free-thinking art professor teaches conservative 1950s Wellesley girls to question their traditional social roles.

name: Under Siege
summary_text: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks
summary_text: Three musical chipmunks are discovered by an aspiring songwriter who wants to use their amazing singing abilities to become famous.

name: World Trade Center
summary_text: Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.

name: Eden Lake
summary_text: Refusing to let anything spoil their romantic weekend break, a young couple confront a gang of loutish youths with terrifyingly brutal consequences.

name: Bloodsport
summary_text: "Bloodsport" follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

name: Wayne's World 2
summary_text: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

name: Polar
summary_text: A retiring assassin suddenly finds himself on the receiving end of a hit, contracted by none other than his own employer seeking to cash in on the pensions of aging employees.

name: The Weather Man
summary_text: A Chicago weather man, separated from his wife and children, debates whether professional and personal success are mutually exclusive.

name: Kingpin
summary_text: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

name: Mechanic: Resurrection
summary_text: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.

name: Hidalgo
summary_text: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.

name: The Hundred-Foot Journey
summary_text: The Kadam family leaves India for France where they open a restaurant directly across the road from Madame Mallory's Michelin-starred eatery.

name: Death Note
summary_text: A high school student named Light Turner discovers a mysterious notebook that has the power to kill anyone whose name is written within its pages, and launches a secret crusade to rid the world of criminals.

name: Look Who's Talking
summary_text: After a single, career-minded woman is left on her own to give birth to the child of a married man, she finds a new romantic chance in a cab driver. Meanwhile, the point-of-view of the newborn boy is narrated through voice-over.

name: Tommy Boy
summary_text: After his auto-parts tycoon father dies, the overweight, underachieving son teams up with a snide accountant to try and save the family business.

name: Mortal Kombat
summary_text: MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.

name: The Kite Runner
summary_text: After spending years in California, Amir returns to his homeland in Afghanistan to help his old friend Hassan, whose son is in trouble.

name: The Longest Ride
summary_text: The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.

name: Sound of Metal
summary_text: A heavy-metal drummer's life is thrown into freefall when he begins to lose his hearing.

name: Taxi
summary_text: To work off his tarnished driving record, a hip taxi driver must chauffeur a loser police inspector on the trail of German bank robbers.

name: Greenland
summary_text: A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster.

name: I Spit on Your Grave
summary_text: A writer who is brutalized during her cabin retreat seeks revenge on her attackers, who left her for dead.

name: Trumbo
summary_text: In 1947, Dalton Trumbo was Hollywood's top screenwriter, until he and other artists were jailed and blacklisted for their political beliefs.

name: The Hudsucker Proxy
summary_text: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

name: Beverly Hills Cop III
summary_text: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who killed his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

name: Star Trek: Generations
summary_text: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a deranged scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

name: The Wedding Planner
summary_text: Mary Fiore is San Francisco's most successful supplier of romance and glamor. She knows all the tricks. She knows all the rules. But then she breaks the most important rule of all: she falls in love with the groom.

name: All the Money in the World
summary_text: The story of the kidnapping of 16-year-old John Paul Getty III and the desperate attempt by his devoted mother to convince his billionaire grandfather Jean Paul Getty to pay the ransom.

name: Midnight Run
summary_text: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

name: Abduction
summary_text: A young man sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

name: All Is Lost
summary_text: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.

name: Get Shorty
summary_text: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

name: Broken City
summary_text: In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed and then framed by its most powerful figure: Mayor Nicholas Hostetler.

name: Fruitvale Station
summary_text: The story of Oscar Grant III, a 22-year-old Bay Area resident, who crosses paths with friends, enemies, family, and strangers on the last day of 2008.

name: The Uninvited
summary_text: Anna returns home after a stint in a mental hospital, but her recovery is jeopardized by her cruel stepmother and ghastly visions of her dead mother.

name: The Outsiders
summary_text: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.

name: Project Almanac
summary_text: A group of teens discover secret plans of a time machine, and construct one. However, things start to get out of control.

name: Double Jeopardy
summary_text: A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.

name: Pink Floyd: The Wall
summary_text: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

name: Entourage
summary_text: Movie star Vincent Chase, together with his boys Eric, Turtle, and Johnny, are back - and back in business with super agent-turned-studio head Ari Gold on a risky project that will serve as Vince's directorial debut.

name: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
summary_text: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

name: The Flintstones
summary_text: In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness.

name: The Mothman Prophecies
summary_text: A reporter is drawn to a small West Virginia town to investigate a series of strange events, including psychic visions and the appearance of bizarre entities.

name: Midnight Special
summary_text: A father and son go on the run, pursued by the government and a cult drawn to the child's special powers.

name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
summary_text: An alien lands and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

name: Conan the Destroyer
summary_text: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

name: White Men Can't Jump
summary_text: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances of winning money on the street courts and in a basketball tournament.

name: Fallen
summary_text: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution, the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

name: Barfi!
summary_text: Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's definition of normal and abnormal.

name: Battlefield Earth
summary_text: It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

name: Snake Eyes
summary_text: A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.

name: Frances Ha
summary_text: A New York woman (who doesn't really have an apartment) apprentices for a dance company (though she's not really a dancer) and throws herself headlong into her dreams, even as the possibility of realizing them dwindles.

name: Blue Streak
summary_text: A former convict poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.

name: The Color of Money
summary_text: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

name: Stir of Echoes
summary_text: After being hypnotized by his sister-in-law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him.

name: Halloween II
summary_text: While Sheriff Brackett and Dr. Loomis hunt for Michael Myers, a traumatized Laurie is rushed to hospital, and the serial killer is not far behind her.

name: Stay
summary_text: A psychiatrist attempts to prevent one of his patients from committing suicide while trying to maintain his own grip on reality.

name: Swingers
summary_text: A wannabe actor has a hard time moving on from a break-up, but he is lucky to have supportive friends.

name: The Dukes of Hazzard
summary_text: Cousins Bo, Luke, and Daisy Duke, and their uncle Jesse, egg on the authorities of Hazzard County, Boss Hogg and Sheriff Coltrane.
